document_data.mainbody:
Duna Duckfens was a duergar from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Duna wore a simple set of chainmail armor.
In the , Duna Duckfens, along with other duergar, giant spiders, and drow, was slaughtered in the home of Bloomridge Park groundskeeper, Lavernica. Dunas body was left broken and decapitated on the cabins floor. The murder spree was performed by Orin the Red and her Murder Tribunal of Bhaal.
